text: The Kiss is a 1896 American silent movie directed by William HeiseThe KissIra Basen, Jane Farrow. The Book of Lists: Revised and Updated and Even More Canadian and stars May Irwin and John Rice. ==Actors== *May Irwin as Widow Jones *John Rice as Billie Bikes ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American silent movies Category:1896 movies
title: The Kiss (1896 movie)
